Type Driven Development

With type driven development we can ensure that the software we craft is modular, easily refactorable, and has minimal complexity as new features are added. By leveraging the type system of strongly typed programming languages like Haskell and PureScript, we can move quickly to keep up with the needs of our clients.

READ MORE






Superb Test Coverage

Our use of funcional programming and strong type systems guarantees that the software we craft is free from an entire class of bugs (type errors). On top of that, we use advanced testing methods like property-based testing to catch even more bugs and ensure software runs the way it should.

READ MORE
